event.title: was incorporated as a borough on March 29, 1927

data.event: Berlin was incorporated as a borough on March 29, 1927, from portions of Berlin Township, based on the results of a referendum held on April 26, 1927.

event.title: the creation of Camden County in 1844

data.event: Upon the creation of Camden County in 1844, it was briefly named the county seat (while the area was still a part of Waterford Township), until 1848 when the seat moved to the city of Camden.
